description: Join our vibrant community events, meetups, and networking sessions to connect with fellow developers and industry professionals.
Be a part of our hands-on sessions where you learn about Design, Development, Systems Engineering, AI and more cool stuff
We actively participate in hackathons and events. Join HRDC to find your next teammates and win hackathons.
Get started by contributing to open source projects with a wide range of tech stack to build real-world impact and earn recognition
